verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal, cham val ab'an tas svala'. Tak'vanh t'ayin, ina to te tojol ach, tzak'annhejelk'och tas tzala'.
Manh a k'anb'ej tas vaj a in a checab' in tik, yujto malaj junok mach wach' yaj t'a a sat.
Ix in pechji b'eyek' yuj eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ix in stek'anem eb' t'a sat lu'um. Ix in yak' cajnaj eb' t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal, icha val yaj eb' chamnacxo.
Manhxo animaoc vaj ticnaic svab'i, te somchajnac in k'ool.
Tzin nacot juntzanh k'ual ek'nac t'a peca', tzin naub'tanhan masanil tas a b'onac t'a yalanhtax chi'.
Ha t'ayach tzin mojb'ejq'ue in k'ab', tzach in nib'ej val, icha val junok lum taquinh lu'um snib'an ha ha'.
Mamin Jehová, tak'vanh t'ayin t'a elanhchamel, toxo val tz'el in k'ol svab'i. Manh a yaej a colval t'ayin. Icha val eb' chamnac smucchajemi, icham chi' ol in ajoc tato tza yaej a colval t'ayin.
Ak' in nacot a wach'k'olal t'a junjun q'uinhib'alil, ina to a ach tzach vak'och yipoc in k'ool. Ch'ox t'ayin tas ol aj in b'eyb'ati, yujto van in lesalvi t'ayach.
Mamin Jehová, colinel t'a yol sk'ab' eb' ajk'ool, yujto a t'ayach tzin say in colnab'il.
k'ayb'ej in yic tzin b'o icha tas tza nib'ej, yujto in Diosal ach. Aocab' Espíritu wach' tzin ik'an b'ey t'a a wach' b'eyb'al.
Mamin, manh in a cha chamoc, yic wach' max alchaj chucal lolonel t'ayach. Ik' in elta t'a skal vilk'olal, yujto wach' ach toni.
Yuj a wach'k'olal t'ayin, yuj chi' tza satcanel masanil eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, yujto a checab' in.
